main: S2 consumes 6 {status:Charge} Count to gain Coin Power, apply {status:ChargeForceField} to herself and 2 allies, increased by her {status:Charge} Potency, and inflict additional {status:Binding} on her target.

S3 consumes 15 Count to gain Coin Power. Applies {status:ChargeLoad} equal to her {status:Charge} Potency to Reson allies, increasing the damage of their {status:Charge} consuming skills for the turn. Being at 2+ {status:Charge} Potency will allow her to spend 7-14 Count instead of 15 to get the Coin Power.
other: Gains {status:Charge} Potency for every 10 Count she spends.
Her passive gives {status:ParryingResultUp} to W Corp. allies depending on her {status:Charge} Potency.

1111001.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter
Turn End: Apply 1 [ParryingResultUp] next turn to ([Charge]) W Corp. employees, including this unit, in reverse Deployment order (max: 5 allies)
1111001.name: Overcharge / Cleanup Order

1111021.desc: 1 ally who has the most [Charge] Count at Turn Start: deal +10% damage with Skills that consumed 7+ [Charge] Count (once per turn)
1111021.name: Refraction
